name: Lux Intacta
description:
Lux Intacta is a procedurally generated, retro, arcade, shoot 'em up, RPG with the one and only ultimate quest! GET THE HIGH SCORE! Level up, collect gems and equip your ship how you want! Become the ultimate space fighter!

BULLETS! So many bullets!
ENEMIES! So many enemies!
SHIPS! 18 cosmetic ships!
STATS! 12 stats let you customize your ship to your own play style!
LEVEL UP! Destroy enemies, gain experience, level up!
UPGRADE! Upgrade any stat on your ship as you level up!
GEMS! Collect 'em!
EQUIPMENT SLOTS! 6 equipment slots let you decide the type of ship you fly!
EQUIPMENT UPGRADES! Upgrade your favorite equipment for even more power!
EQUIPMENT SETS! Equip equipment from the same equipment set to make your fighter even more powerful!
DIGITIZER! Digitize new equipment as you collect gems!
MULTIPLAYER! Play with up to 4 players simultaneously!
MODES! Different modes allow for maximum replayability! GET THE HIGH SCORE!
